DOC.brief_title: Use Oral Contraceptives ( OCs ) Containing Dienogest Risk Venous Thromboembolism
DOC.detailed_description: This population-based case-control study Germany . Cases woman 15 49 year old diagnosis venous thromboembolism ( VTE ) . The VTE diagnose Germany January 2002 und December 2007 . Controls woman 15 49 year old without VTE diagnosis . About 4 control match year birth region allocate case . Both case control receive similar self-administered questionnaire except case-specific question applicable control . Study participant ask informed consent . Data confidentiality ensure Berlin Center Epidemiology Health Research .
DOC.criteria: case : woman venous thromboembolism 15 49 year old control : woman without venous thromboembolism diagnosis 15 49 year old woman outside define age range woman severe language problem woman willing participate
